answers.answer: I would say 50/50 lol (accidentally hit post)! I've heard the first child either comes 2 weeks early or 2 weeks late. My first came on my due date as I was induced due to gestational diabetes.
I am just hoping and praying I go at least a day after my due date.. lol so stressful.  But thank you so much for your advice.

Honestly when I was induced, I was in no way shape or form ready to begin labor. My daughter was not ready. And after 27hrs, she still refused to come out. Same with my sisters baby. Our babies are 2 days apart. It took her 2 days to have hers. So don't stress :) Odds are good!
Awesome!  Most of my sisters passed their due dates with their first as well.. hopefully it'll all work out. 27 hours! You are one strong momma :)

Lol, she's worth it! I'm pregnant with my second now and I will not be induced regardless of the circumstances lol! The only reason I agreed with my first is the drs kept telling me she was 10+ lbs. She weighed 7lbs4oz! So nope, I'm definitely not doing that again!

I'd ask the teacher. usually if they have classes other days, you can take your final that day. like if your class ends on a thurs and he has a mon class, you can take it a few days early to be safe. Or maybe you can do it after your final class prior to that( a week early). A lot of professors are understanding if you ask ahead of time. If they say no early enough, i'd see if i could find the same class online or take it next semester, because you don't want a 0 because you're giving birth and you don't want to be giving birth and worrying about how you're missing your final.
@afm I am hoping you don't get induced as well that weight difference shows me everything is not always correct. Wishing you an easy labor and delivery!
Thank you elle! I will definitely bring this up the first day of class. Sounds like a wonderful plan.. I hate stressing about school.

question: What are the chances my baby might come early?  I am starting fall classes and it ends right on my due date.. I am afraid I might miss classes or finals.. I am a low risk ftm by the way.
title: Help! .. I need advice please
